abstract: Sets the offset of the guest timestamp-counter (TSC) relative to the Hypervisor’s TSC clock.

declaration.code: func hv_vcpu_set_tsc_relative(_ vcpu: hv_vcpuid_t, _ offset: Int64) -> hv_return_t

overview:
## Return Value

`0` on success, or an [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_return_t] error code.

## Discussion

Use this function to set the TSC-offset field in the VMCS so that the TSC value in the guest is the value of [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_tsc_clock()] plus the given offset. The examples below show simple ways to calculate and set the TSC offset:

items.description: Returns the value of an abstract clock.
items.name: hv_tsc_clock()

title: hv_vcpu_set_tsc_relative(_:_:)
